data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Dobrich an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dobrich, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Dobrich, Bulgaria that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Dobrich, Bulgaria will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Lord, please give the 3,375 believers in the state of Dobrich the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Tatar, Crimean people. Make the Tatar, Crimean people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Dobrich, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Dobrich, Bulgaria.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Lord, there are 136,911 people in the state of Dobrich who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

location.name: Dobrich
location.cities_list: Dobrich, Balchik, Kavarna, General Toshevo, Tervel
location.cities_list_w_pop: Dobrich (94,831), Balchik (13,000), Kavarna (11,205), General Toshevo (7,758), Tervel (6,808)
